docs.snippet: After winning a series against Detroit and its stellar pitching staff, the Yankees are six games over .500 thanks to the play of some unheralded newcomers....
docs.lead_paragraph: After winning a series against Detroit and its stellar pitching staff, the Yankees are six games over .500 thanks to the play of some unheralded newcomers.
docs.abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column notes that despite all their setbacks, New York Yankees are six games over .500, mostly because of the play of unheralded newcomers.

headline.main: Yankees Follow Winding Road but Keep Playoffs in Sight

docs.lead_paragraph: Kayla Roncin, 12, of Toms River, N.J., and Mo’ne Davis, 13, of Philadelphia, played together in regional events that award berths to the Little League World Series.
docs.abstract: Kayla Roncin of Toms River, NJ, and Mo’ne Davis of Philadelphia are the last girls still playing in regional events that award berths to Little League World Series.

headline.main: Two Girls Fuel Their Teams’ Push Toward Little League’s Pinnacle

docs.snippet: Mr. Van Wieren, known as the Professor for his encyclopedic knowledge of baseball and the extensive research he did for each broadcast, spent 33 years with the Braves before retiring in 2008....

docs.abstract: Pete Van Wieren, last surviving member of broadcast team that carried Atlanta Braves games throughout nation on Ted Turner’s Superstation, dies at age 69.

headline.main: Pete Van Wieren, Atlanta Braves Broadcaster, Dies at 69

docs.snippet: A 14-year-old girl held with four other teens after the beating of a University of Southern California graduate student has been charged with seven felonies in an unrelated Dockweiler Beach robbery that took place later that day, authorities said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A 14-year-old girl held with four other teens after the beating of a University of Southern California graduate student has been charged with seven felonies in an unrelated Dockweiler Beach robbery that took place later that day, authorities said.
